attributes.action: Increase income tax to 99% for incomes/bonuses/pensions over £500,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To encourage people to aspire, yet suffocate greed, tax should be levelled on all income, bonuses, golden hand-shakes and pensions at the rate of 60% for the above inclusive incomes above £100,000, with an increase of 5% tax for each £50,000 step above the aforesaid, to £450,000 p.a., when the final increase would be 99% tax for incomes above £500,000. 
This enables people to strive, but ego-trip incomes will actually cost such people in financial terms. The public would be less outraged by ridiculous incomes, pensions, bonuses and ‘handshakes’ if they knew the bulk of it would go back into the public purse.
This needs to be agreed across all countries of the world, so that very high earners don't play one country off against another.
This should also be applied in retrospect to the last 15 years, as well as to future earnings.
